entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow or rain. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain with risk of freezing rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
